metadata.title: Friday, 23rd October, 2015
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    when the Lwela Bridge, along the Mungulube-Mulumbi road in Chembe Parliamentary Constituency, will be rehabilitated;
(b)    what has caused the delay in rehabilitating the Bridge; and
(c)    what the cost of the project is.
(a)    whether the Government has any plans to repeal the law relating to construction of houses for former Presidents, in view of the escalating cost involved;
(b)    if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c)    if there are no such plans, why.
(a)    when Mapula Primary School in Chembe Parliamentary Constituency will be rehabilitated; and
(b)    what has caused the delay in rehabilitating the School.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and  Housing
parts: (a)    how many boreholes were sank in Milenge District from 2011 to 2014, year by year; and
(b)    how many boreholes are earmarked for sinking in 2015 and 2016. ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Supply Motion (9th October) - Resumption of Debate. _________________________
